item.description:
Soul Searching
Father Peter Bowes
Thursday, June 18 • 7:30 p.m.

Where is your soul and how will you find it? Who will take you there? Everywhere you turn, you hear the “soul” mentioned; people looking for their “soul mates” and trying to discover who they are as souls. All the while, the nature and location of the soul remain unknown to so many; but not to all. At this seminar, Father Peter will awaken within you the truth about the soul, which will leave you with a clear understanding that will springboard you into a real search that will lead to discovery.

Suggested Donation: $25

http://sites.google.c...
item.how_to_find_us: We're just around the corner from the Stony Brook T-stop on the orange line.
item.name: Seminar: Soul Searching
